| HistoryText             = The Midnight Guns were an occult paramilitary group who had taken up residence in the former [[Fortress of the Sinisters]] in [[Salem (Massachusetts)|Salem]]. They were targeted by [[Herbert Wyndham (Warp World) (Earth-616)|Herbert Wyndham]] of the [[Evolutionaries (Warp World) (Earth-616)|Evolutionaries]] since team-member [[Daimon Gallows (Warp World) (Earth-616)|Hellfire]] possessed the [[Storm Sigil]], a powerful artifact that could augment the chances for success in Wyndham's upcoming ritual to have [[Mephicthton (Warp World) (Earth-616)|Mephicthon]] possess [[Laura Kinney (Warp World) (Earth-616)|Weapon Hex]].

Weapon Hex and her handler [[Hellhound (Warp World) (Earth-616)|Hellhound]] were sent to attack the Midnight Guns' base and they did easy work of the vigilantes, leaving no survivors and taking the Storm Sigil for themselves.{{r|Infinity Wars: Weapon Hex Vol 1 1}}

| Notes                   = * The Midnight Guns are based on the [[Midnight Sons (Earth-616)|Midnight Sons]]. However, out of all Midnight Sons members, only [[Daimon Hellstrom (Earth-616)|Hellstrom]] is adapted into the Midnight Guns, combined with [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]] into [[Daimon Gallows (Warp World) (Earth-616)|Hellfire]].
